channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road poor condition, 27th February
item.description:
Pot holes all over the road it’s terrible
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dunkery Road, Mottingham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The paved area which is large at the junction of Goddard Road, 27th February
item.description:
This area could be greatly improved with the addition of hanging planters or large planters filled with flowers, this is an unused area that could even have some benches/seating with huge planters. It could be a more communal stop for local residents to chat and enjoy
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamppost, 27th February
item.description:
Lamp post very temperamental and dim light please come this road section be adjusted all lights renewed as there is a lot of activities in this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beaconsfield Road, Mottingham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This area at the turning junction of Goddard Road is muddy grass, 27th February
item.description:
This are is a mess and needs planting, the junction is busy and some planting here flowers etc will improve the area and raise the look of the area, the elm tree makes a great effort to improve the look of our area and planting here will do the same
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goddard Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Light not working, 27th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Priestlands Park Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: 50cm diameter. 125mm deep., 27th February
item.description:
Large pothole by bus stop at end of Mount Road outside no. 7, close to mini roundabout junction with Upton Road. B13 bus is increasing the size of this daily as it is located at the bus stop.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Road, Blendon, Greater London

item.title: All the bollards at the traffic light junction and the bottom of Goddard Road up to the elm tree pub are rusty, dirty, falling apart and damaged., 27th February
item.description:
All need repairing, repainting or replacing. They are rusty and paint flaking this is dangerous and a hazard, they are falling apart and are dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, Greater London

item.title: Same coffee shop doing fly tipping, 27th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kimmeridge Road, Elmstead, Greater London

item.title: There is rubbish all through the bushes from the bus stop area s d all way round the perimeter of Tesco to the bus terminal it’s full of rubbish leaves and needs weeding and cutting, 27th February
item.description:
It’s filthy and have seen rats the whole green space needs litter removed, cut pruned and weeded pavements cleared of green shrubbery

item.title: Bike ramps and holes have been dug, 27th February
item.description:
South Hill Wood is a no bike/cycling zone, but someone has set up bike ramps and dug at least 3 large holes in the wood, north east of the tennis courts. The woods are SINC and need protection. The ground flora are at risk. The ground is being churned up by bike tyres making it difficult for people to walk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Hill Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Normanhurst Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Litter scattered down Petts Wood Road, 27th February
item.description:
